def_cn: 英语字母表的第1个字母
def_en: A is the first letter of the English alphabet.

def_cn: C大调音阶中的第六音；A音
def_en: In music, A is the sixth note in the scale of C major.

def_cn: （作业、考试等）甲等，优等
def_en: If you get an A as a mark for a piece of work or in an exam, your work is extremely good.

def_cn: （用于首字母为 a 的一些单词的缩写，如 acceleration，ampère和answer）
def_en: A or a is used as an abbreviation for words beginning with a, such as 'acceleration', 'ampère', or 'answer'.

def_cn: 从一处到另一处；从甲地到乙地
def_en: People talk about getting from A to B when they are referring generally to journeys they need to make, without saying where the journeys will take them.

def_cn: 英语字母表的第1个字母
def_en: A is the first letter of the English alphabet.

def_cn: C大调音阶中的第六音；A音
def_en: In music, A is the sixth note in the scale of C major.

def_cn: （作业、考试等）甲等，优等
def_en: If you get an A as a mark for a piece of work or in an exam, your work is extremely good.

def_cn: （用于首字母为 a 的一些单词的缩写，如 acceleration，ampère和answer）
def_en: A or a is used as an abbreviation for words beginning with a, such as 'acceleration', 'ampère', or 'answer'.

def_cn: 从一处到另一处；从甲地到乙地
def_en: People talk about getting from A to B when they are referring generally to journeys they need to make, without saying where the journeys will take them.

def_cn: 英语字母表的第1个字母
def_en: A is the first letter of the English alphabet.

def_cn: C大调音阶中的第六音；A音
def_en: In music, A is the sixth note in the scale of C major.

def_cn: （作业、考试等）甲等，优等
def_en: If you get an A as a mark for a piece of work or in an exam, your work is extremely good.

def_cn: （用于首字母为 a 的一些单词的缩写，如 acceleration，ampère和answer）
def_en: A or a is used as an abbreviation for words beginning with a, such as 'acceleration', 'ampère', or 'answer'.

def_cn: 从一处到另一处；从甲地到乙地
def_en: People talk about getting from A to B when they are referring generally to journeys they need to make, without saying where the journeys will take them.

def_cn: （指初次提及或非特指的人或物）一（个）
def_en: You use a or an when you are referring to someone or something for the first time or when people may not know which particular person or thing you are talking about.

def_cn: （一类人或事物中非特指的）任何一（个）
def_en: You use a or an when you are referring to any person or thing of a particular type and do not want to be specific.

def_cn: （用于前加形容词或后加修饰语的不可数名词之前）一（种）
def_en: You use a or an in front of an uncount noun when that noun follows an adjective, or when the noun is followed by words that describe it more fully.

def_cn: （用于物质名词前）一（类），一（种）
def_en: You use a or an in front of a mass noun when you want to refer to a single type or make of something.

def_cn: （用于表示数量的词组中）许多/少许/一点
def_en: You use a in quantifiers such as a lot ,a little, and a bit.

def_cn: （一类人或事物中典型的）一（个）
def_en: You use a or an to refer to someone or something as a typical member of a group, class, or type.

def_cn: （用于日子、月份或节日的名称之前以表示特例）一个
def_en: You use a or an in front of the names of days, months, or festivals when you are referring to one particular instance of that day, month, or festival.

def_cn: （从事某一职业的）一（位），一（名）
def_en: You use a or an when you are saying what someone is or what job they have.

def_cn: （用于不为说话人所知的首次提到的人名前）某一（个）
def_en: You use a or an in front of the names of people as a way of indicating that you do not know them or anything about them and you are saying their name for the first time.

def_cn: （用于人名前，表示与该人有相同特性或品质）类似…的一个（或一位）
def_en: You use a or an in front of the names of people when you want to refer to someone else who has the same qualities or character as the person named.

def_cn: （用于姓氏前，表示某人属于某姓氏家族）一位姓…的人
def_en: You use a or an in front of a surname when you want to refer to someone who belongs to the family with that surname.

def_cn: （用于艺术家名字前）一幅…的画，一件…的雕塑作品
def_en: You use a or an in front of the names of artists to refer to one individual painting or sculpture created by them.

def_cn: （代替数字one使用，尤用于hundred，hour和metre等表示度量的单词之前以及half, quarter和third等分数之前）
def_en: You use a or an instead of the number 'one', especially with words of measurement such as 'hundred', 'hour', and 'metre', and with fractions such as 'half', 'quarter', and 'third'.

def_cn: （用于表示比率的短语中）每一
def_en: You use a or an in expressions such as eight hours a day to express a rate or ratio.
